website_summaries.verdict: Business travelers will find the Verizon Jetpack MiFi 4620L an excellent companion thanks to its fast connection, nice set of features, and long-lasting battery. Its expensive and limited data plans, however, might steer casual users away.
pros: The Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi 4620L by Novatel Wireless provides fast Internet access to up to 10 devices at a time, supports Wireless-N, and has many features
The compact router has long battery life, especially with the included double-capacity battery
cons: The Verizon Jetpack MiFi 4620L comes with expensive and limited data plans and doesn't support Wi-Fi Protected Setup, and there's no way to wake it remotely

customer_reviews.title: The best mifi hotspot ever out there.
customer_reviews.text: I must say this tiny little device is my holy grail for my rv. I received it sooner than expected also my daughter loves it because she is able to connect her ipad air 2, her laptop and other devices. I got a prepaid account with verizon and that's it. I am in the woods right now enjoying my stay and my mifi.. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yania

customer_reviews.title: Verizon insisted on an annually subscription. I only need ...
customer_reviews.text: Verizon insisted on an annually subscription. I only need it when I travel. Verizon said I could do that but they would charge me a reconnect fee. SO I purchased a straight talk mobil hot spot. I can buy some gigs for a month - then no charge when I am not traveling. Straight talk is much more cost effective. Straight talk uses the Verizon network or ATT network depending on which unit you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Weems

customer_reviews.title: This a great product as it fluctuates from 3G to 4G LTE ...
customer_reviews.text: This a great product as it fluctuates from 3G to 4G LTE automatically. The 10 device limit is fine for most people. Unfortunately I bought this after talking to Verizon about remaining on my plan, they lied as I was unable to keep my present unlimited plan, even though I was told at the Verizon store my plan was still unlimited. So be careful, If you have an unlimited 3G plan, keep it. This is the wrong device then. I am however keeping the device, as the price of data goes down, who knows maybe I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: JayJ

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great as expected and much cheaper than Vorizon offering and I set it up my self with out any issues very quickly with help from Vorizon website.
customer_reviews.author: C. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Everything was going good, it arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: After reading the description and reviews I finally picked this as a cheap alternative to the other verizon jetpacks. Everything was going good, it arrived on time, and was in good condition. It doesn't come with a SIM card so I had to go to verizon to get one but when i went to buy a data plan I was not presented with the desired option of the $50 plan, It's only the crappy $30 and $90 plan.
customer_reviews.author: ddonte

customer_reviews.title: Speed Demon Jetpack
customer_reviews.text: I received the Verizon Novatel Jetpack on time and was as advertised. Get a 5 star because I get blazing 4G speed, easy set up, and wonderful Verizon customer service. I did have to get 4G sim card, free at the Verizon store. Set up was easy and it works seamlessly and fast! For business use getting on server at work and fits the bill, perfect purchase! I was able to set up separate account with MIFI separate no contract 5G data for $50 bucks and no contract. A little more expensive than Walmart brand MIFI, but time is money and I cannot afford break in signal! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Roro

customer_reviews.title: Consistently the best choice.
customer_reviews.text: Of the MiFi's I've used out there, I consistently find that the Verizon performs they best in the most geographic areas.
customer_reviews.author: David Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: This device is great! I had one that was purchased directly from ...
customer_reviews.text: This device is great! I had one that was purchased directly from my Verizon a couple of years ago and although it worked; it stopped charging which defeats the purpose for "remote" usage. I ordered this one from Amazon and to my surprise it works the same as the other one! This was a great savings as I didn't want to get back into a contract situation again and this device is serving the same purpose as before.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Really slow, may be Verizon in ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Really slow, may be Verizon in my area.

customer_reviews.title: Save on Data Charges
customer_reviews.text: Good WIFI alternative for rural areas where Verizon service is good. (Almost everywhere)

customer_reviews.title: it works good, and I like it show the data usage ...
customer_reviews.text: Looking at this as a replacement for our intermittent internet service, it works good, and I like it show the data usage right on the display. It works good. I did have to purchase a charger for it, which added another $30. That was disclosed in the description though

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this
customer_reviews.text: So far, it is great, faster than my old mifi, and no problems. Verizon was going to charge me $190. For a new one through them, but the customer service man a Verizon was nice enough to tell me I could probably get it cheaper from Amazon, and that is what I did. I just moved my SIM card from the old one to the new one. When it didn't work at first, I turned it off, removed the battery, and turned it on again, and it was working. I did have a new password for this one.

I got this hotspot for my car so when i have some passengers they can have internet connection bcs Verizon's coverage is really better than most of the carriers

The whole point in the device is so it can be mobile. I would not purchase again from this company. I basically received worse than what I was trying to replace. I'm very disappointed with my purchase!

customer_reviews.title: it would have been nice to know that I needed it
customer_reviews.text: It came on time, however, there was a surprise, it came without a sim card. While the card was only another $15.00 at Verizon, it would have been nice to know that I needed it. I needed the new "hot spot" because I either lost the old one or it was stolen in Alaska. I had the original for 19 months, and pay Verizon Wireless $230.00 a month for all of my services, they wanted over $300.00 to replace it with this same one. I would buy this again from Zaggydoo as they were prompt and the product was exactly what I expected except for the lack of the SIM card.

customer_reviews.title: It was a completely wasted purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The Verizon MiFi Jetpack 4620L worked intermittently out of the box but the battery was never able to charge. Once the battery died I could get the device to start up only sometimes, when plugged into the wall. Once working it would connect to the Verizon cell signal and work for about five minutes then drop the signal completely. It was a completely wasted purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Leitner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my money
customer_reviews.text: This would really be a great product if Verizons prepaid plans weren't so ridiculous. $15 only gives you 250mb of data then it jumps straight to $60 for 3GB and the only other plan is $90 for 10GB. Plus the product doesnt come with a sim card so you have to buy that extra from them as well. The products price was a good buy though and I kinda see why. It also arrived earlier then planned too.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: but i purchased for a great price and was able to successfully activate
customer_reviews.text: So far i haven't used the mifi yet, but i purchased for a great price and was able to successfully activate.

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: We are RVers and need to have a reliable wifi connection. The 4620L is reliable, powerful and fast. We are able to have a monthly use without a contract which is great for travelling who only spend a few months in the USA. I took the unit up a mountain in Arizona and got good reception, even 4G.
customer_reviews.author: George G Best

customer_reviews.title: You sold me one that did not work and I ...
customer_reviews.text: You sold me one that did not work and I had to buy a data card for it. And it was used ???
customer_reviews.author: Ricky  Murra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to adjust to it - seemed unpredictable. But OK now.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase anything from this store
customer_reviews.text: Unit was returned because it obviously was not tested. There was a broken SiIM pin that problem. This was all uncovered after trying to activate the unit w Verizon for over two hours! Never again will I buy form this on line store John
customer_reviews.author: John Crump

customer_reviews.title: Rural / Portable Internet option
customer_reviews.text: Works real well, where I live in Rural America the providers do not provide cable or fiber optics access. For Cell internet service this is a great option. I plugged in the optional antenna (Verizon Wireless Novatel MiFi Jetpack 4620L 4G LTE Global Hotspot external antenna and antenna adapter cable 3db) It improved the signal strength and internet input and output speed. I also use the United AT&T MiFi Device. You can also take this internet anywhere. Battery operated lasts several hours. My MiFi Jet Pack is always on and has never failed. Easy set-up and operation.
customer_reviews.author: Jere L. Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly, plugged it into the wall, moved ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, plugged it into the wall, moved the sim from my (near dead) phone into it, it saw the network and connected. Connected my tablet to it, and it worked as advertised. Called verizon to change to a data-only plan. I've traded unlimited text (which I never used) and voice (which I used rarely) for an extra 3GB of data (which google voice will use to connect my calls) and saved $20/month. The only reason it doesn't get five stars is that it was used, and had no manual.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Works if you connect and disconnect frequently, hangs if the connection lasts more than a day
customer_reviews.text: This wireless router's UI and battery life are good. However its network connection doesn't last for connected devices for more than a day. This is regardless of whether connected devices use the connection a lot, just a few times, or even not at all. The router itself freezes after a day or two. The longest it went without freezing when I used it over two months was three days. Once it's broken you have to restart it. This is fine if you take it with you and use it in bursts, but if you don't want to give it daily attention, it's not really usable.
customer_reviews.author: Haik Sahakian

customer_reviews.title: item would not charge
customer_reviews.text: The jetpack would not charge after about 8 hours, it still shoed 0%. I tried the battery in my old jetpack, and the battery was fine, so the charging issue is with the jetpack. I want to return it and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elisheva

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace my current device which was on the fritz. Just moved the chip from the old unit to the new and got right on line.
customer_reviews.author: pcoats

customer_reviews.title: The Jetpack works great as a hotspot
customer_reviews.text: The Jetpack works great as a hotspot. Have two issues with it: 1. The standby charge time is pretty bad for 2015. Not even a day 2. A required firmware update keeps failing. I'll need to contact Verizon to find out why - which is annoying. Update 08/17/2015: spoke to Verizon technical support: need to return/exchange device.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brice

customer_reviews.title: Add a Mugen power extended battery to this and you ...
customer_reviews.text: Add a Mugen power extended battery to this and you have an all day wifi. If I'm going out this really helps with reception, especially in dead zone coffee shops. There's even a place for a antenna, which can add 1 1/2 bars reception. The larger 5200 MA battery will also allow your phone to charge off it. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scheinker

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a 3 gig unit, speed difference is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 3 gig unit, speed difference is not directly noticeable given all the variables involved. The display is handy for determining when the unit is actually ready for use v.s. the guessing game with blinking green light. Battery is more robust and longer lasting. The unit meets our modest connectivity needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: TECHNOLOGY IS OUR FRIEND?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It is a million times better than the MIFI I had before. This tells you how much data you've used, how many devices are hooked up and how much data you have left!!!!!! AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Service was excellent and service rep was courteous and timely in her response to my call. Timely delivery as well. Device was as advertised and packaged well to prevent breakage. I only had to return because the Verizon Tech I called prior to this order didn't tell me my plan would change if I activated another device.
customer_reviews.author: Gizzy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A much better version of the old mifi we had. Still have to be careful as the USB connector is only secured to the main board and not the housing so it can be damaged if the cable is offset when plugged in repeatedly
customer_reviews.author: popuptarget

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works ... not for mission critical work
customer_reviews.text: Flakey is best term I can use. When it works the device is really quite nice, but most of the time it connects on 1x when the phones we have connect on LTE If you let it sit a long time it will sometimes switch to LTE but not always. If you set it to LTE only then it goes to no service so you kind of have to leave it in the "global" setting to get consistent coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time for my purpose while camping. Impossible to get service.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Went directly to my Verizon Wireless store and had it activated (free) and I was off and running..love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this jetpack from just about anywhere. I use it with my laptop and use my webcam and people are amazed what they see. Sometimes I am in New York City but sometimes I am in woods near home! Signals are good enough everywhere go. Excellent for the person that wants to be online from just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hiram Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Works good no complaints here
customer_reviews.text: Works good no complaints here. If the jetpack isn't plugged in after an hour or so it will turnoff to save power. I leave it plugged in so I can connect my tablet from the living room whenever

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How to avoid 2 year contracts: cheap WiFi modems :-)
customer_reviews.author: avdrav

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hotspot out there hands down. monthly fee is also the most.. and worth it for the 4D.
customer_reviews.author: Fair and Balanced

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: Ruggedly constructed. The display is a little difficult to read in sunlight. Battery life is very good but not as good as Verizon's latest jetpack model.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas T King

customer_reviews.title: We're back online!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the chipped off corner of the device, I am happy with it as it's good to have internet practically anywhere I go.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it working out well don't have to use my drain my phone battery
customer_reviews.author: nakia watkins

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me!
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations in ordering this because of complaints about it not being "new". While the packaging doesn't seem to be from a retail packing (but more like a "Bulk - New" packaging), nothing about my device looks used or refurbished. Works as expected, and at a cheaper price than purchasing the newest Mifi from Verizon only to be locked into a contract. My only gripe is, and it could be a Verizon thing and not so much a device, but it won't let me update the firmware over the air or via the computer. I keep getting notification on my device to update but I couldn't. That's the only reason I'm deducting a star from my review.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jay

customer_reviews.title: Sender was great, product,  wasn't  so much
customer_reviews.text: The product itself don't work, but sender was great, and returned without any problems
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Landry

customer_reviews.title: Poor pickup
customer_reviews.text: it is an older model, does not connect like the newer one.
customer_reviews.author: rking

customer_reviews.title: charger cannot charge.
customer_reviews.text: Just received and discovered that the charger is not charging. Apart form that all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Tobore Koloko

customer_reviews.title: Not Refurbished Well
customer_reviews.text: It was working, but the charger plug pulled out the inside jack and now needs repair after one use. Does not seem refurbished. Was traveling at the time 😁
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Otaibi

customer_reviews.title: The battery was bad the SIM card was being used by someone else ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery was bad the SIM card was being used by someone else and I could never get a hold of the place I naught it from
customer_reviews.author: jim conner

customer_reviews.title: Snappy with good display...know your data plan
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. It is technically not compatible with my Nest thermostat (no cell based unit is), but it limps along for that, sometimes with mysterious outages for an hour or so...but only for the thermostat! It will stream video just fine. Handy display. Clicks along with no problems. If left plugged in all the time I know the battery will only last a couple years, but replacement batteries are not too hard to find or too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SchmidtD

customer_reviews.title: They item itself seems to work although I haven't gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: They item itself seems to work although I haven't gotten a sim card yet. The charger it came with does not work
customer_reviews.author: booms416

customer_reviews.title: This device improves 4GLTE reception makes for better remote Internet experience
customer_reviews.text: Live in rural atea with only internet access via cell phone cellphone hotspot works but have t leave cell phone in remote places for reception. . This device improves 4GLTE reception makes for better remote Internet experience. Coupled with external antenna makes for more reliable internet. Would love to have fiber access...but this beats satellite options.
customer_reviews.author: NotWesLan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I can connect the kids ipads and go anywhere with wifi.

customer_reviews.text: Worked great - very easy to use. Just tossed my phone sim in and it worked :) I'm a happy camper

customer_reviews.text: Works excellent in cit.y In remote area which is what I bought it for not so much. May look for compact antenna. Can only be used with contract OR post pay account.

customer_reviews.title: too difficult
customer_reviews.text: device did not work as advertised by this seller., so i would not recommend buying , unless you enjoy having difficulties with device. return policy is not great and it seems to take too long to get a return straightened out fr such.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Item can not function with another data card
customer_reviews.text: When going to a store (Verizon), I could not obtain a data plan with monthly flat fee to be activated month by month. The same hardware is on sale in the Verizon shop with a monthly data plan, but marketing does not allow it for other serial numbers of the same hardware. MIFI was useless and I had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Verizon Mifi for a while and wanted to upgrade to 4G. This device has been great. I've used it for several months now. I like it better than the previous generation. The small display gives you more status information on number of devices connected, battery life, etc. It seems to connect and hold the signal well.
customer_reviews.author: lisle_g

customer_reviews.title: ... when traveling in our RV and we were not disappointed! Never had a problem except coming and going ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use when traveling in our RV and we were not disappointed! Never had a problem except coming and going through the Blue Ridge mountains. There, we lost connection maybe a total of 10 minutes combined. We used our IPADs to keep in touch with our family. Would recommend to anyone who doesn't have a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Exception MiFi ! I love it .. Great shopping at Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Brady

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the battery is the wrong battery...does not fit or work. This is not new as stated in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of crap!! It overheated like crazy even when charging ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap!! It overheated like crazy even when charging and now does even power up anymore. Will not get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno Ryno

customer_reviews.title: Not NEW
customer_reviews.text: It was described as new - even on the outside of the box but then it was listed as refurbished when I opened the box. Did not come with a SIM card.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sweet WiFi from the MiFi.
customer_reviews.text: I am standing on the back porch to review this product... because it is turned off. Otherwise, anywhere in the house and about 20 feet outside would have 2 to 5 bars. It requires a data plan. At this time, 5Gb runs around $50.00 and the 10Gb plan we have runs $80.00. The FCC is vying for the government's cut as we speak. Thanks BO.
customer_reviews.author: Camas House Publishing

customer_reviews.title: This is more about the item description than it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is more about the item description than it is about the item itself. I recently purchased this and expected to hit the ground running only to find that it doesn't come with a SIM card. The description says nothing about this... I read through reviews and, found others stating the same thing... Not sure why they didn't at least put this in the description... Definitely misleading...
customer_reviews.author: Billybyter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: NO SIM card! How frustrating. Now I have to wait 3 days to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: carol atwell

customer_reviews.title: The signal is not very good, let a person very suspicious of this item ...
customer_reviews.text: The signal is not very good, let a person very suspicious of this item has been Is it right?For this 4G wireless router

product_meta.title: Verizon MiFi Jetpack 4620L Verizon Wireless Wi-Fi 4G LTE Hotspot Modem
product_meta.description:
Service Provider: Verizon Wireless - ONLY 

 Model: Novatel Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot - MiFi 4620L.

 Features: The Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot - MiFi 4620L is a Global Ready, 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot and the next generation of the Novatel Wireless MiFi Intelligent Mobile Hotspot portfolio for Verizon Wireless, building on award-winning innovation and design. This 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot provides ultimate global support allowing you to stay connected while traveling abroad. The Verizon Jetpack - MiFi 4620L creates a personal Wi-Fi cloud, capable of sharing high-speed 4G LTE and 3G Mobile Broadband Internet connectivity with up to 10 Wi-Fi-enabled devices simultaneously. It supports the latest security requirements, complying with the strictest corporate VPNs. It includes new features such as an interactive OLED display, allowing customers to scroll through menu options, check security settings, view battery life and manage connected devices. The Jetpack is compatible with all major operating systems including Windows, Mac OSX, Android, and iOS

 4G LTE Mobile Broadband-capable Mobile Hotspot Is Global Ready. 

 Compatible With All Major Operating Systems Including Windows, Mac OSX, Android, and iOS. 

 Multi-color Service State LED Lights. 

 Connect Up To 10 WiFi-enabled Devices In 4G and Up To 5 Devices In 3G. 

 Supports The Latest Security Requirements, Complying With The Strictest Corporate VPNs. 

 Global Ready - Supports Data Roaming In Over 200 Countries. 

 Interactive OLED Display Shows Connection Status, Number Of Users Connected, and View SMS Alerts. 

 Dimensions: H x W x D Size: 3.74" x 2.36 x 0.53 in. 

 Weight: 3 oz. (85g). 

 Wireless Band: CDMA 2000 1X EV-DO Rev. A, LTE, EDGE, GPRS, DC-HSPA+, UMTS, HSPA+, CDMA 2000 1X EV-DO Rev. 0 .

 WiFi Mode: 802.11n, 802.11g, 802.11b. 

 Battery life: Usage–Up to 5hrs 

 MSRP: $299.95.
feature_bullets: Verizon Wireless Only - MiFi 4G LTE Hotspot
Connect Up To 10 WiFi-enabled Devices In 4G and Up To 5 Devices In 3G
Compatible With All Major Operating Systems Including Windows, Mac OSX, Android, and iOS
Battery life: Usage–Up to 5hrs - Weighs only 3 oz
Interactive OLED Display Shows Connection Status, Number Of Users Connected, and View SMS Alerts.
